summary: A small utility I made to help me arrange my scattered mods.
descriptionHtml:
I downloaded 552 mods from NexusMods.com, but arranging them manually is stupid.

The uploaded archive contains 2 utilities with their source code, it will arrange mods into a single folder and give them proper names as they are on NexusMods.com.

I could make a third utility to arrange the folders further into categories as per NexusMods.com but number of folders were manageable for me.

After categorizing it into folders, you can easily use Wrye Smash to install category by category and make proper decisions.
author: Anonymous
